list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an implement consisting of a small, shallow oval or round bowl on a long handle, used for eating, stirring, and serving food.
a thing resembling a spoon in shape.
convey (food) somewhere by using a spoon.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Rosie spooned sugar into her mug
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Rosie muỗng đường vào cốc của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of two people) behave in an amorous way; kiss and cuddle.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I saw them spooning on the beach
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi thấy họ muỗng trên bãi biển

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: hit (a ball) up into the air with a soft or weak stroke.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he spooned his shot high over the bar
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy bắn nhiều tay lên quầy bar
